sourcesContent:
import { Component, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-bar-nav', templateUrl: './bar-nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./bar-nav.component.css'], }) export class BarNavComponent { isCollapsed: boolean = false; @Output() sidebarToggle = new EventEmitter(); constructor() {} toggleSidebar(): void { this.isCollapsed = !this.isCollapsed; this.sidebarToggle.emit(this.isCollapsed); } }
